description: "This late 18th century map of Batavia (Jakarta) focusses on the network of canals and rivers surrounding the city, as well as the many fields and plantations, including rice fields (‘Champ de Ris’) and sugarcane (‘Cannes de Sucre’)."
label: "The landing of the British Army at Chillinching on the island of Java 4th Augt. 1811"
